data: Bibliographie et ressources utiles concernant le web sémantique dans le cadre du cours HNU6054.

Allemang, D., Hendler, J. A. et Gandon, F. L. (2020). Semantic web for the working ontologist: Effective modeling for linked data, RDFS, and OWL (Third Edition). Association for Computing Machinery.
Bachimont, B. (2006, 3 juillet). Qu’est-ce qu’une ontologie ? Technolangue.net. Portail des technologies de la langue. http://www.technolangue.net/imprimer.php3?id_article=280
Berners-Lee, T. (1989). Information management: A proposal. World Wide Web Consortium. https://w3.org/History/1989/proposal.html
Berners-Lee, T. (1998). Cool URIs don’t change. World Wide Web Consortium. https://www.w3.org/Provider/Style/URI
Berners-Lee, T. (2009a). The next web. TED Talk. https://www.ted.com/talks/tim_berners_lee_the_next_web
Berners-Lee, T. (2009b, 18 juin). Linked data. Design Issues. https://w3.org/DesignIssues/LinkedData.html
Berners-Lee, T., Hendler, J. et Lassila, O. (2001). The Semantic Web. Scientific American, 284(5), 34‑43. https://doi.org/10.1038/scientificamerican0501-34
Bizer, C., Heath, T. et Berners-Lee, T. (2023). Linked Data - The story so far. Dans O. Seneviratne et J. Hendler (dir.), Linking the World’s Information: Essays on Tim Berners-Lee’s Invention of the World Wide Web (1re éd., p. 115‑143). Association for Computing Machinery. https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3591366.3591378
DuCharme, B. (2013). Learning SPARQL: Querying and updating with SPARQL 1.1 (Second edition). O’Reilly. http://www.learningsparql.com
Gandon, F. L., Faron-Zucker, C. et Corby, O. (2012). Le Web sémantique : comment lier les données et les schémas sur le Web ? Dunod.
Heath, T. et Bizer, C. (2011). Linked Data: Evolving the Web into a global data space. Springer Nature. http://linkeddatabook.com/book
Hitzler, P., Krötzsch, M. et Rudolph, S. (2010). Foundations of semantic web technologies. Chapman and Hall/CRC Press.
Linked Open Data. (s. d.). Europeana PRO. Récupéré le 3 juin 2024 de https://pro.europeana.eu/page/linked-open-data
Posner, M. (2021, 7 janvier). What is Linked Open Data? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VZBpFiLbi-Y
The Fitzwilliam Museum. (2022a, 1er avril). Linked Open Data: how does it work. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0m79yDb4AzE
The Fitzwilliam Museum. (2022b, 1er avril). Linked Open Data, what on earth is that? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mMR6JQ1M6qE
Yu, L. (2014). A developer’s guide to the Semantic Web (Second Edition). Springer.

Baca, M. (dir.). (2016). Introduction to metadata (3e éd.). Getty Research Institute. http://www.getty.edu/publications/intrometadata
Bermès, E. (2013). Le web sémantique en bibliothèque. Éditions du Cercle de la librairie. https://www.cairn.info/le-web-semantique-en-bibliotheque--9782765414179.htm
Harpring, P. (2010). Introduction to controlled vocabularies: Terminology for art, architecture, and other cultural works (1re éd.). Getty Research Institute. https://www.getty.edu/publications/virtuallibrary/160606018X.html
Hyvönen, E. (2012). Publishing and using cultural heritage Linked Data on the Semantic Web. Morgan & Claypool. https://doi.org/10.2200/S00452ED1V01Y201210WBE003
Juanals, B. et Minel, J.-L. (2016). La construction d’un espace patrimonial partagé dans le Web de données ouvert. Communication. Information médias théories pratiques, (vol. 34/1). https://doi.org/10.4000/communication.6650
Maignien, Y. (2014). Les enjeux du web sémantique. Dans M. Eberle-Sinatra et M. Vitali-Rosati (dir.), Pratiques de l’édition numérique (p. 77‑93). Presses de l’Université de Montréal.
Mayer, A. (2015). Linked Open Data for artistic and cultural resources. Art Documentation: Journal of the Art Libraries Society of North America, 34(1), 2‑14. https://doi.org/10.1086/680561
Michon, P. (2017). Archivistique, histoire et Web sémantique : une approche interdisciplinaire basée sur l’événementiel. Archives, 47(1), 85‑105. https://doi.org/10.7202/1041827ar
Oldman, D., Doerr, M. et Gradmann, S. (2015). Zen and the art of linked data. Dans A New Companion to Digital Humanities (p. 251‑273). John Wiley & Sons. https://doi.org/10.1002/9781118680605.ch18
O’Neill, B. et Stapleton, L. (2022). Digital cultural heritage standards: from silo to semantic web. AI & Society. https://doi.org/10.1007/s00146-021-01371-1
The LODLAM Unconferences. (2023, 9 février). The LODLAM Unconferences. https://lodlam.net
Van Hooland, S. et Verborgh, R. (2015). Linked Data for libraries, archives and museums: how to clean, link and publish your metadata. Facet. https://doi.org/10.29085/9781783300389

Blaney, J. (2017). Introduction to the principles of linked open data. Programming Historian, 6(2017). https://doi.org/10.46430/phen0068
DeBellis, M. (2021, 8 octobre). A practical guide to building OWL ontologies using protégé 5.5 and plugins. Récupéré le 14 janvier 2022 de https://drive.google.com/file/d/1A3Y8T6nIfXQ_UQOpCAr_HFSCwpTqELeP/view
Drummond, N., Horridge, M., Dameron, O., Rector, A. et Wang, H. (2006). A practical introduction to protégé OWL. Docslib. https://docslib.org/doc/4997892/a-practical-introduction-to-prot%C3%A9g%C3%A9-owl
Feigenbaum, L. (2009, 9 juin). SPARQL by example. A Tutorial. World Wide Web Consortium. https://www.w3.org/2009/Talks/0615-qbe/
Noy, N. F. et McGuinness, D. L. (s. d.). Ontology development 101: A guide to creating your first ontology. Récupéré le 15 février 2022 de https://protege.stanford.edu/publications/ontology_development/ontology101-noy-mcguinness.html
SPARQL tutorial. (s. d.). Apache Jena. Récupéré le 9 juin 2024 de https://jena.apache.org/tutorials/sparql.html

Dodds, L. et Davis, I. (2022). Linked data patterns: A pattern catalogue for modelling, publishing, and consuming linked data. https://patterns.dataincubator.org/book/ (Publication originale en 2012)
Falco, R., Gangemi, A., Peroni, S., Shotton, D. et Vitali, F. (2014). Modelling OWL Ontologies with Graffoo. Dans V. Presutti, E. Blomqvist, R. Troncy, H. Sack, I. Papadakis et A. Tordai (dir.), The Semantic Web: ESWC 2014 Satellite Events (p. 320‑325). Springer International Publishing. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-11955-7_42
Frosterus, M., Hansson, D., Dadvar, M., Kyriazis, I. et Zapounidou, S. (2021, février). Best Practices for Library Linked Open Data (LOD) Publication. LIBER Linked Open Data (LOD) Working Group. https://libereurope.eu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/LOD-Guidelines-FINAL-Feb-2021.pdf
Guillem, A. et Bruseker, G. (2017). The CIDOC CRM Game: A Serious Game Approach to Ontology Learning. The International Archives of the Photogrammetry, Remote Sensing and Spatial Information Sciences, XLII-2-W5, 317‑323. https://doi.org/10.5194/isprs-archives-XLII-2-W5-317-2017
Guillem, A. et Bruseker, G. (2021). CIDOC CRM Game. CIDOC CRM Game. http://www.cidoc-crm-game.org
Hyland, B., Atemezing, G. et Villazón-Terrazas, B. (2014, 9 janvier). Best practices for publishing linked data. Récupéré le 17 février 2023 de https://w3.org/TR/ld-bp/
Lohmann, S., Negru, S., Haag, F. et Ertl, T. (2016). Visualizing ontologies with VOWL. Semantic Web, 7(4), 399‑419. https://doi.org/10.3233/SW-150200
Negru, S., Lohmann, S. et Haag, F. (2014, 7 avril). VOWL: Visual Notation for OWL Ontologies. http://vowl.visualdataweb.org/v2/
Peroni, S. (2017). A simplified agile methodology for ontology development. Dans M. Dragoni, M. Poveda-Villalón et E. Jimenez-Ruiz (dir.), OWL: Experiences and directions – Reasoner evaluation. 13th international workshop, OWLED 2016, and 5th international workshop, ORE 2016 (p. 55‑69). Springer International Publishing. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-54627-8_5
Peroni, S. (s. d.). Graffoo - Graphical Framework for OWL Ontologies. Récupéré le 4 avril 2024 de https://essepuntato.it/graffoo/
Sparnatural - Javascript SPARQL query builder. (s. d.). Récupéré le 26 juin 2023 de http://sparnatural.eu
Super, R. (2023, 19 avril). Semantic Web and Linked Data. UCLA Library. https://guides.library.ucla.edu/semantic-web/
Triply. (2020). Yasgui. Triply. https://yasgui.triply.cc

DuCharme, B. (2021, 17 octobre). You probably don’t need OWL. And if you do there’s a simple way to prove it. bobdc blog. https://www.bobdc.com/blog/dontneedowl/
Gagnon, M. (2015). Logique descriptive et OWL. https://moodle.polymtl.ca/pluginfile.php/463527/mod_resource/content/8/logique_descriptive2.pdf
Gerlach, L. (s. d.). Description Logics. Récupéré le 9 juin 2024 de https://dl.kr.org/
Harmse, H. (2018a, 26 avril). Understanding OWL Existential Property Restrictions. Henriette Harmse. https://henrietteharmse.com/2018/04/26/understanding-owl-existential-property-restrictions/
Harmse, H. (2018b, 10 mai). Understanding OWL Universal Property Restrictions. Henriette Harmse. https://henrietteharmse.com/2018/05/10/understanding-owl-universal-property-restrictions/
